attributes.review: I’m not the type of person to judge a book by its cover but I’m sorry this app is terrible

attributes.review: I thought that this app would be a great learning experience for me, but it turns out is nothing like I expected, it is even worse. When I opened the app I knew that it was a scam. I am very disappointed, I highly recommend to not download this app!
attributes.title: Terrible... worst experience ever!!

attributes.review: this app is genuinely one of the worst apps i have ever downloaded, you have to login with your number and it sends your number spam messages 😡 it is pointless and needs to be taken off the app store
attributes.title: PLZ DELETE

attributes.review: I would rate this app lower if i could!!! it’s horrible, i wish i would have never even downloaded it in the first place. I AM DISGUSTED to even download it, as soon as i opened the app it locked me out of my iPhone and when i tried to log back in, i was infiltrated with ANNOYING ads!! definitely deleting and will FOR SURE not vote for trump!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I wanted icecream, so I came here to see if an orange man can get me my chocolate icecream. Turns out he didn’t; he decided to not give it to me. Instead he just said to “vote for me” instead of giving a single kid ice cream...
attributes.title: Smelly icecream

attributes.review: When I opened the app one of my voodoo dolls decided to put a curse on me and know I have to drink a cup of my blood so thanks trump for this curse.
attributes.title: This app knows how to do voodoo sh*t

attributes.review: If he takes down TikTok we will have nothing to do trumps a bum we need TikTok this orange man can’t do anything right
